name: Capture The Camera
description:
FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED

Your connection to the camera is under attack by your evil clones! Fight back or flee through a maze of obstacles to keep control.

Don't get pulled offscreen. Don't let the timer run out. Collect coins to refill the timer.

Controls: WASD to move, Mouse to Aim, Click to Attack

//This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK2021 game jam
